Package jobqueue

Provides the classes to bring up a queuing system for parallel computations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputStreamThread
    (Package private class) Invokes a thread that flushes a buffer of the given stream.
    QueueMngr
    The main class that manages the queuing system.
    Resource
    Entity object for a resource.
    ResourceMngr
    (Protected class) Manages the resources.
    RunProcess
    Invoke a process which executes the command at the resource.
    Task
    (Abstract class) Provides a template of the task to be submitted to the QueueMngr.

Package jobqueue Description

Provides the classes to bring up a queuing system for parallel computations.

The classes in this package are intended for the following functions:

  1. Read the information of resources from a file, "resources.info".
  2. Provide a template class to define a task.
  3. Submit and carry out tasks on the resources specified in 1.
  4. Terminate the execution when a file "terminate" exists in the same folder.

-- Example code -- 

    QueueMngr qm = QueueMngr.getInstance();
    qm.printStatus();
    System.out.println("[Sending Tasks]");
    qm.start();
    for(int i=0; i$lt;10; i++){
      Task rj = new TaskTest(i);
      qm.submit(rj);
    }
    System.out.println("[End of Send]");
    qm.shutdown();
    System.out.println("[End of Program]");
Since:
Sindo 3.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kiyoshi Yagi
